title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     August 12, 2016  Civil War Soldier's Cremated Remains to Travel through Appomattox Court House National Historical Park  On August 18, at 1:00 p.m., the cremated remains of Private Jewett Williams, 20th Maine Infantry, Company H, will be brought to Appomattox Court House NHP for a ceremony honoring his military service.  Pvt. Williamsâ€™ remains were recently discovered in Oregon and are being transferred back to his home state of Maine, but will pass through Appomattox Court House NHP as part of that trip.   December 23, 2015  Park Changes its Hours of Operation for 2016  Beginning Jan. 2, 2016, the park will open at 9:00 a.m. instead of 8:30 a.m.   September 03, 2015  Appomattox Court House NHP Launches Every Kid in a Park Pass  Fourth Graders and their Families Eligible for Free Access to Federal Lands and Waters Nationwide
